Initial_Invitation.Subject: UCLA WISE Test Survey -- win a free iPad (Not really, just testing!)
Initial_Invitation.p: To begin the survey, please go to the following link:

Start_Reminder.Subject: Reminder -- UCLA WISE Test Survey -- win a free iPad (Not really, just testing!)
Start_Reminder.p: To begin, please go to the following link:
If you don't wish to participate, you can use the following Web address to decline participation now. Using this link will prevent us from contacting you again about this survey:

Interrupt.Subject: UCLA WISE Test Survey -- Survey interrupted
Interrupt.p: Thank you for starting the UCLA WISE Test Survey. This message is a reminder that you were interrupted before completing the survey. You are still eligible to win an iPad.
Please resume the survey at your earliest opportunity by clicking on the Web address below:
Thank you very much for your assistance with this important matter and your continued involvement in the UCLA WISE Test Survey. Your input is very valuable for our continued success.

Completion_Reminder.Subject: UCLA WISE Test Survey -- Survey interrupted
Completion_Reminder.p: Thank you for starting the UCLA WISE Test Survey. This message is a reminder that you were interrupted before completing the survey. You are still eligible to win an iPad.
Please resume the survey at your earliest opportunity by clicking on the Web address below:
Thank you very much for your assistance with this important matter and your continued involvement in the UCLA WISE Test Survey. Your input is very valuable for our continued success.

Message.Subject: UCLA WISE Test Survey -- Final invitation
Message.p: To begin, please go to the following link:
Thank you very much for your assistance with this important matter and your continued involvement in the UCLA WISE Test Survey. Your input is very valuable for our continued success.

Welcome_Page.Title: UCLA WISE Test Survey -- win a free iPad
Welcome_Page.p: Please provide us with the most accurate information possible. We may follow-up for more information.
Thanks so much for your responses.

ThankYou_Page.Title: Thank You
ThankYou_Page.p: Thank you so much for completing the UCLA WISE Test Survey.
If you have any questions or comments regarding this survey, please contact one of the developers.
